summary: Certified Project and Program Manager with more than seven years experience in multidisciplinary environments;  Proven communication skills with internal and external stakeholders from Asia, America and Europe;  Experienced manager with leading big complex programs as well as multiple projects running simultaneously;  Worked as Installation and Site Leader on different locations around the world; Successfully managed various Software and Hardware delivery,  Development and integration projects starting from Purchase Order through Customer Acceptance; Proven ability to lead and coordinate cross-functional teams in agile environment;  Confident presenter with ability to translate complex technical content for clients as well as senior management; Natural leader, coach and proactive manager with solution - oriented mind;

education.field_of_study: with specialization in Math, Physics and Geometry

courses.name: High Impact Communication from TwentyEighty Strategy Execution - certified October 2018
Leadership Fundamentals Program from Lockheed Martin - certified June 2015
Negotiation skills for Project Managers from TwentyEighty Strategy Execution - certified November 2018
PMP® Exam Power Pre from TwentyEighty Strategy Execution
Programme Management from TwentyEighty Strategy Execution - certified September 2018

profile_positions.description:
In December 2016, I got offer to relocate to CAE office in Germany. I was assigned to manage international program NH90 and later I also became responsible for program M346 and A109.

Responsibilities:
- Lead and organise between 5 and 15 inter-connected projects within three programs
- Monitor and update ETC (Estimate to Complete) together with Program Management Office
- Keep all important project stakeholders up to date (in total 10-20 stakeholders)
- Track and coordinate day to day cross-project activities
- Conduct post-project reviews followed up with handover to Customer Support
- Budget Holder in excess of 60,000,000.00 Euros  
- Lead identification of risks during bidding phase of strategic project 
- Make adjustments to projects constraints based on financial analysis 
- Perform risk assessment, including risk analysis (identification and estimating the risks effect)
- Responsible for Contract administration with a support from Program Management Office
- Work closely with Sales Department to start-up new projects
- Ensure that all projects are delivered in-time, within scope, budget and quality
- Implement changes to meet projects outputs
- Manage the relationship with customers and all stakeholders

Achievements:
- Create and implement new Risk Procedure for entire company based on PMI standards
- Drive successfully all activities during preparation of commercial proposal
- Integrate few Engineering Change Proposals on long term service agreements 
- Solve and successfully close procurement activities on program lasting more then 10 years

Customers: 
Dutch Ministry of Defence (NLMod), Belgium Ministry of Defence (BeMoD), NATO Support and Procurement Agency (NSPA), Helicopter Training Media International (HTMI), Rotorsim and Thales

Key words: 
Project Management, Program Management, Risk Management
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
When Lockheed Martin CFT (Commercial Flight Training division) was acquired by CAE in May 2016, I got additional project called ACARS - Aircraft Communications Addressing and Reporting System, which was multi-platform development project.

Responsibilities:
- Conducted Earned Value Management (EVM) on weekly basis including variance analysis
- Defined project requirements and led the implementation of project objectives
- Performed risk management to minimize project risks 
- Ensure customer’s requirements are being met
- Had full responsibility and accountability for the project team including team performance
- Managed changes to the project scope, schedule and cost baselines
- Identified and documented high-level risks, assumptions, dependencies and constrains
- Led the implementation of the risk response actions and tracked their status with team 
- Ensured resource availability as well as allocation of resources
- Tracked and maintained Schedule and Cost Performance Index (SPI and CPI)
- Developed comprehensive project plan to monitor and track progress
- Update and deliver projects status reports to senior management on monthly basis

Achievements:
- Re-planned schedule, cost and scope project baseline within 1 week followed by approval
- Led and coordinated a product development for 3 different platforms

Customers:
FedEx and various platforms within CAE CFT

Key words:
Project Management, Risk Management
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Due to success in my previous role as Deputy Program Manager within Lockheed Martin CFT (Commercial Flight Training division), I got promoted as Project Manager.

Responsibilities:
- Ensured handover of program FedEx to Customer Service as part of project life cycle
- Defined project tasks and resource requirements on-site
- Developed full project site plans including travel budget and installation schedule
- Coordinate engineering support during snag closure phase
- Led the execution of project management plan on-site
- Maintained Risk Register for the biggest program FedEx
- Responsible for deployment and / or relocation of technical teams and equipment on site
- Measured project performance using tool such as MS Project
- Coordinated internal resources and third parties for the project execution
- Reported risk to the board of directors on monthly basis

Achievements:
- Started Risk Management from scratch for the biggest program within Lockheed Martin CFT
- Managed successfully two site acceptances of training device
- Led qualification of the full flight simulators in US

Customer:
FedEx

Key words:
Project Management, Risk Management, Construction Management (customers facilities)
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
In October 2014 I got opportunity to work as Deputy Program Manager on the biggest program within Lockheed Martin CFT (Commercial Flight Training division). The goal of this program was development of Boeing 767 platform with delivery of three different training devices.

Responsibilities:
 - Managed and coordinated cross-functional teams across multiple organisations
- Tracked project progress during testing phase using tools such as SW Jira
- Worked closely with other departments to ensure maximum operational efficiency 
- Managed subcontractors like Q4 or Rockwell Collins with fixed price contract
- Participated in high level management meeting with key customer FedEx
- Assisted in the definition of project scope and objectives
- Involved during project execution all relevant stakeholders

Achievements:
- Achieved re-qualification of two different devices in Singapore
- On-site Representative, Leader and Coordinator for period of more than one year
- Executed site installation of simulators as per schedule
- Enhanced and unblocked communication with customer after stepping into the running program

Customer:
FedEx

Key words:
Project Management, Program Management, Construction Management (customers facilities)
profile_positions.title: Associate Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
I was hired as a Building Integration Specialist due to my Master's Degree in Civil Engineering and my previous experience with customers. My role was to oversee the planning, design, and construction of a industrial projects from its beginning to its end.

Responsibilities:
- Led technical reviews ensuring that they were in compliance with installation guideline
- Assisted in resolving problems during pre-installation preparation
- Prepared technical documentation for installation in customer’s facility
- Provided technical reports from site investigation for Business Development Department
- Coordinated with customers refurbishment or renovation of their facilities
- Inspected buildings' structure to determine the need for changes
- Supervised multi-disciplinary teams like internal staff as well as external contractors
- Controlled activities like parking space allocation or waste disposal
- Drafted reports and making written recommendations for customer and senior management
 
Achievements:
- Managed a tender process from beginning till end for structural analysis in Thailand
- Successfully achieve site readiness on various locations around the world
- Gained strong knowledge and understanding of customer via excellent communications skills

Customers:
FedEx, Lufthansa, Hainan Airlines, Delta Airlines

Key words:
Project Management,  Construction Management (customers facilities)
profile_positions.title: Building Integration Specialist

profile_positions.description:
I worked for Waldom Electronics only for four weeks because Lockheed Martin CFT offered me another position.

Responsibilities:
- Clear communication of progress to internal stakeholders
- Ensured the timely and successful delivery of solutions according to customer needs
- Operated as the main point of contact for customers

Key words: 
Account Management
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
In February 2012, I decided to accept offer for Sales Account Manager for Prague´s region, where I come from.

Responsibilities:
- Built and maintained strong, long-lasting customer relationships 
- Ensured client demands were satisfied 
- Gain strong knowledge and understanding of client 
- Met with clients to discuss and resolve any issues 
- Persuaded new customers to plan business with our company 
- Sought out potential clients from diverse sources 
- Tracked progress, revising plans to ensure sales goals were met 
- Worked with internal departments regarding on-going servicing

Key words: 
Account Management
profile_positions.title: Sales Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
This job was great opportunity to gain good understanding of operations. It was also a moment when I decided to deviate from my career as Architect/Engineer.

Responsibilities:
- Assess the agreed contracts of both customers and sub-contractors
- Assisted with Bookkeeping, Payroll, A/R and A/P processing
- Monitored compliance with work permits, visas, insurance and HSE documents
- Operated as point of contact between consultants and company
- Processed monthly expense reports and time-sheets
- Produced contracts based on information from Front Office
- Responsible for data entries and updates in database

Key words:
Operations Management
profile_positions.title: Project Operations Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Having worked in challenging economic times, I embraced the challenges of that time with flexibility and adaptability. To be part-time Sales Assistant allowed me to pursue in parallel my career as Architect/Engineer.

Responsibilities:
- Administered and completed invoices and claims
- Liaised between customers and Account Manager
- Made in/outgoing sales calls
- Maintained customer information through CRM
- Monitored and responded to customer orders
- Resolved customer requests, questions and complaints
- Responsible for stock quality control
- Supported Management Team with basic reports

Key words:
Account Management
profile_positions.title: Sales Assistant

profile_positions.description:
During one year with VSAP, I assisted with initial project research and design of projects. I performed site surveys and measured drawings in Den Haag as well as prepared sketch plans and working drawings by CAD system and 3D models for customers.

Key words:
Engineering and Architecture
profile_positions.title: Architect (Trainee)

profile_positions.description: "Nederland wordt anders" was research lab organized by Dutch Government in 2009 during the Global Financial Crisis. Over the period of 4 months, I analysed information and answer inquiries, then organised data in charts and graphs for presentation and constructed written summary of research findings.
profile_positions.title: Architect & Researcher
